summary: During WW2, a 3000-strong American unit, known as Merrill's Marauders, battles the Japanese forces in Burma.
cast: Jeff Chandler|Ty Hardin|Peter Brown|Andrew Duggan|Will Hutchins|Claude Akins|Luz Valdez|John Hoyt|Charlie Briggs|Chuck Roberson|Chuck Hayward|Jack C. Williams|Chuck Hicks|Vaughan Wilson|Pancho Magalona|Mark Slade
